description: Try our easy to follow Cheese, Cucumber & Carrot Sandwich + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheese, Cucumber & Carrot Sandwich + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cheese, cucumber and carrot on bread slice, then sandwich with remaining slice.

Snack 1: Preheat oven to 160oC/140oC fan-forced. Line a baking tray with baking paper. Combine pepitas, sesame seeds and syrup in a large bowl. Spread mixture onto tray in an even layer, about 1cm thick. Bake for 20 minutes oruntil a deep golden colour and crisp. Set aside to cool completely. Break into bite-size pieces. Store in an airtight container. (Crackers serve 10.)
Snack 2: Using a melon baller, scoop balls from melons. Thread alternating balls of watermelon and honeydew onto wooden pop sticks. Pack in an airtight container.
Snack 3: Place halved egg and capsicum into separate containers.
